title: Keelikolani Middle School teacher wins contest for classroom improvements | News | kitv.com
text:
Keelikolani Middle School teacher wins contest for classroom improvements
Kimiko Maeda-Leon, a teacher at Keelikolani Middle School, won first place in the Fisher Hawaii and University of Hawaii's College of Education Classroom Makeover contest. New teachers submitted essays describing the importance of having a classroom environment that promotes teaching and learning. Her prize includes $500 to stock up on supplies for her classroom.
